definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: But in the our country, the accessory offender and should be a kind of to cross the relation with accomplice.
sentences.chinese: 而在我國，幫助犯和從犯應該是一種交叉關係。

sentences.english: Daniel Chan played a secondary role, the Department of accomplices .
sentences.chinese: 陳曉東起次要作用，系從犯。

sentences.english: Well , What did you geet from your mistakes during these years?
sentences.chinese: 那你這些年從犯錯中吸取了什麼經驗？

sentences.english: Mr Smith was believed to be an accessory to the murder .
sentences.chinese: 史密斯被認爲是該謀殺案的從犯。

sentences.english: New China has reclaimed many men from a life of crime.
sentences.chinese: 新中國把許多人從犯罪的道路上挽救了回來。

sentences.english: Well,what did you get from your mistakes during these years?
sentences.chinese: 那你這些年從犯錯中吸取了什麼經驗？

sentences.english: He was charged with being an accessory to the crime.
sentences.chinese: 他被認爲是該謀殺案的從犯。

sentences.english: He was just an accessory of a robbery, but he was sentenced to death.
sentences.chinese: 他只是一起搶劫案件中的從犯，卻被判處死刑。

sentences.english: Paul was made accessory to the theft.
The accessory before the fact was brought to court for trial this morning.
sentences.chinese: 那名事前從犯今天上午被提審。

sentences.english: The manacles were removed from the prisoner'swrists.
sentences.chinese: 從犯人的手腕上除去了手銬。

sentences.english: He had taken these lists from the drawer of the prisoner's desk.
sentences.chinese: 這些表冊是他從犯人的書桌的抽屜裏拿出來的。

sentences.english: JJ: This is what he looks like as a teenager.
sentences.chinese: 這就是那個少年從犯的畫像。

sentences.english: Those who have supported him will pass for his accomplices.
sentences.chinese: 那些支持他的人就要被視爲他的從犯。

sentences.english: They were charged with being accessories to the breach of copyright laws.
sentences.chinese: 他們被指控爲違反著作權法的從犯。
